thread.title: EZ Dupe Introduces the New Media Maven Plus Duplicator
thread.title_full: EZ Dupe Introduces the New Media Maven Plus Duplicator

author: EZ Dupe
title: EZ Dupe Introduces the New Media Maven Plus Duplicator
text: EZ Dupe: By Email RSS Feeds: EZ Dupe Introduces the New Media Maven Plus Duplicator EZ Dupe introduces the new Media Maven Plus Duplicator. Media Maven Plus series duplicator is based on Media Maven duplicator with more features. City of Industry, CA, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- EZ Dupe introduces the new Media Maven Plus Duplicator, featuring Disc to Disc duplication, USB to Disc duplication and USB to USB duplication. Media Maven Plus Series Duplicator is based on Media Maven duplicator, plus an extra USB port to support duplication of USB devices. The new Media Maven Plus Duplicator is powered by Athena technology with higher media compatibility and faster data transfer rate. Media Maven Plus Duplicator gives you the convenience of two duplicators in one helping you to get more done in less time!Media Maven Plus Duplicator Features:· Disc to Disc Copy: Duplicates Blu-ray/DVD/CD discs and virtually any disc in a matter of minutes.· Multi-Session Technology: Allows several small capacity USB devices to be placed onto one Blu-ray/DVD/CD disc.· Disc Spanning: Allows larger USB device, whose contents may exceed the capacity of a single Blu-ray/DVD/CD disc, to be placed onto the appropriate number of discs.· Back up USB Devices to Discs: Transfers important data from erasable USB devices to standardized DVD/CD discs.· USB to USB Duplication: Quickly copy USB drive.· One-Touch Button Duplication: Easily copy from USB to Blu-ray/DVD/CD disc(s) with one-touch button operation.· 5-button Control Panel: User-friendly control panel button design for easy access.About EZ DupeEZ Dupe is headquartered in City of Industry, California with factory in Taiwan. EZ Dupe enjoys the leadership position in replication technologies and is a preeminent manufacturer of high performance USB, CD, DVD, Blu-Ray, HDD, SD, and CF flash memory card duplication systems. The company focuses on its core businesses including DVD, CD, Flash Memory, USB and portable technologies.Contact:
